==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|浅|薄}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{qualifier|obsolete}} [[淺薄]]

===Etymology===
From [[浅]] (''sen'', “shallow”) + [[薄]] (''paku'', “thin”)

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|せんぱく|decl=da}}

# [[shallow]]; disapproving a person, piece of work, or idea because of luck of any serious or careful thought.

{{ja-adj|せんぱく|decl=nari}}
* '''Nari Declension''' (ナリ活用)
# [[shallow]]; disapproving a person, piece of work, or idea because of luck of any serious or careful thought.
#* '''1911''', Inazō Nitobe, ''Shūyō (修養, Cultivation of the mind)''
#*: ..., ただ偶爾の随感随想を述べたるに過ぎざれば、自ら'''浅薄'''なりと思う点も多く、...
#*:: ''..., tada gūji no zuikan-zuisō o nobetaru-ni sugizareba, mizukara '''senpaku'''-nari to omou ten mo ōku, ...''
